alert.note: Alert for Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; Henderson; Polk Mountains; Rutherford Mountains (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 22 at 10:56AM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Henderson, Caldwell Mountains, Burke Mountains, Rutherford Mountains and Polk Mountains Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. A Wind Chill Warning is also in effect for this area.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; Henderson; Polk Mountains; Rutherford Mountains
